about_the_game:
A small village on the most characteristic Italian coastline, where the days pass slowly, strolling through narrow alleys, and enjoying a sunny lunch on the terrace... is about to be shaken by the adrenaline-fueled excitement of the craziest races ever! Meet in the square to kick off the show and discover the hidden corners of this wonderful Italian village, with its restaurants, shops, and the church bell tower.

Experience the thrills of racing behind the wheel of Italian-made speedsters like the Alfa Romeo 155 V6 TI and Lancia 037, or choose to enjoy the Dolce Vita aboard the legendary Fiat 500D Modificado or the iconic Vespa 90 SS Super Sprint (1966).

Among roof tiles, bricks, and stones, get ready to show everyone what you're made of with the Made in Italy Expansion Pack!

This DLC includes:
  • 1 Environment to build your tracks: Italian Village;
  • 4 Vehicles: Alfa Romeo 155 V6 TI, Lancia 037, Fiat 500D Modificado, Vespa 90 SS Super Sprint (1966);
  • 1 new area to add to the Hot Wheels™ Creature Rampage mode;
  • Background, Profile icon, Tag and Card Background to further customize your Unleashed Profile!

This DLC is included in the HOT WHEELS UNLEASHED™ 2 - Season Pass Vol. 1.

Meet in the square to kick off the show and discover the hidden corners of this wonderful Italian village, with its restaurants, shops, and the church bell tower.

Among roof tiles, bricks, and stones, get ready to show everyone what you're made of with the Made in Italy Expansion Pack!

short_description: Experience the Dolce Vita of racing through alleys, shops, restaurants, and the sunny square of a coastal village aboard true icons of the automotive Made in Italy. Show everyone what you're made of with the Made in Italy Expansion Pack!

*languages with full audio support
